mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotelTable (hotelNumber, wido, gyengdo, hotelName, cityCode, zipcode, addr1, addr2, bdgType, hotelInform, suid) VALUES (#{hotelNumber}, #{wido}, #{gyengdo}, #{hotelName}, #{cityCode}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{bdgType}, #{hotelInform}, #{suid})

INSERT INTO roomTable (roomNumber, roomName, hotelNumber, roomInform, maxGuest, conv, baseCost, weekCost, longCost) VALUES (#{roomNumber}, #{roomName}, #{hotelNumber}, #{roomInform}, #{maxGuest}, #{conv}, #{baseCost}, #{weekCost}, #{longCost})
mapper.select: select hotelimage.savefile, hotelimage.hotelNumber, hoteltable.hotelName from hotelimage join hoteltable on hotelimage.hotelnumber = hoteltable.hotelnumber where hoteltable.suid = #{suid}
